participating-org.narrative:
Mozambican Civil Society Platform for Social Protection(PSCM-PS) was established to respond to the need and desire of Civil Societyactors to actively participate in an organized manner in the area of social protection contributing therefore to citizens exercising their rights to social protection.
PSCM-PS aims to create synergies amongst the SC actors in the quest for joint advocacy mechanisms in the area of social protection, working with key actors and bilateral partners that work in the economic, social and political fields in the country.
This partnership with Oxfam is supporting PSCM-PS to implement his Strategic Plan and achieve its visionto protect the most vulnerable to poverty through the promotion of reflections and discussions around social protection issues with the view to influence social protection processes and legal framework, to ensure the existence of minimum conditions for their survival and participation in the country development and fully exercising their basic rights. This vision is consubstanciated by the mission that foresees an active and vibrant civil society that engages in the decision making processes with the view to minimize, according to the countries economic situation, the unhuman situation of the socially vulnerable groups, ensuring them access to basic social services.
The PSCM-PS is being achieving good results on their advocacy initiatives, monitoring social services. They have astrong collaboration with the Government and Members of Parliament whatcontributes for influencing decision making processes on improving of social protection in Mozambique.

mailing-address.narrative: PO box 30919, 2500 GX The Hague, The Netherlands

sector.narrative: The right to social and political participation
